mapper.insert: insert into product( id, created_date, last_modified_date, version, caption, cost, hits, introduction, is_active, is_delivery, is_list, is_marketable, is_top, keyword, market_price, max_commission, memo, month_hits, month_hits_date, month_sales, month_sales_date, name, parameter_values, price, product_images, sales, score, score_count, sn, specification_items, total_score, type, unit, week_hits, week_hits_date, week_sales, week_sales_date, weight, brand_id, product_category_id, store_id, store_product_category_id) values( #{id}, #{createdDate}, #{lastModifiedDate}, #{version}, #{caption}, #{cost}, #{hits}, #{introduction}, #{isActive}, #{isDelivery}, #{isList}, #{isMarketable}, #{isTop}, #{keyword}, #{marketPrice}, #{maxCommission}, #{memo}, #{monthHits}, #{monthHitsDate}, #{monthSales}, #{monthSalesDate}, #{name}, #{parameterValues}, #{price}, #{productImages}, #{sales}, #{score}, #{scoreCount}, #{sn}, #{specificationItems}, #{totalScore}, #{type}, #{unit}, #{weekHits}, #{weekHitsDate}, #{weekSales}, #{weekSalesDate}, #{weight}, #{brandId}, #{productCategoryId}, #{storeId}, #{storeProductCategoryId})
